text:
This is awesome, thank you.

One thing generally missing on documentation pages, think Wikipedia, is that the width of the text content is too wide.

Suggestion: Set max-width for text to 700px and increase paragraph font-size to 18px. It would be a huge improvement to the experience when plowing through documentation.
Thank you for that feedback <@UAR0YP7KM> we may be tweaking the width soon.
You could use the `menu()` function and apply your own markup
Basically, it's data from one custom module into another custom module for display. Possible?
Using {{ my_content.allWidgets|pprint }} I can see that the data is accessible. Just need to display it somehow.

I’m not really sure what you are trying to do here but I’m interested in seeing if I can help. You have time Saturday or sometime next week to do a screen share and give me a little walk through if what you have going on?
